Related

Stats

Historical

Biography

2019 – First ever recipient of the Creed Service award ... Appeared in five games on defense, starting in all five before suffering a season ending injury … tallied 416 minutes on the year ... Earned D2ADA Academic Achievement Award ... Earned President's List.

2018 - Started in all 16 games on defense as a junior … played in all 90 minutes in 15 games … recorded seven shots on the year, three being on goal … had one assist at California (Pa.) (9/29) … totaled 1,437 minutes leading the team in minutes.

2017 - Started in all 16 appearances on defense as a sophomore … recorded two shots on the season … played all 90 minutes in 12 games … played a career-high 110 minutes at Pitt-Johnstown (9/2) … totaled 1,397 minutes on the season. Game-by-Game Statistics

2016 - PSAC Scholar Athlete ... started in 17 games at defense as a freshman … recorded shots against Bloomsburg (10/5) and Shippensburg (10/22) … played all but six full games ... totaled 1,527 minutes. Game-by-Game Statistics

High School - Two-sport athlete at Hershey as a member of the soccer and track & field teams … selected Defensive All-Pennsylvania Player in 2015 … PennLive 1st Team All-Star selection in 2015 … named soccer Player of the Year for the Keystone Division of the Mid Penn Conference … 1st Team All-Mid Penn selection in 2015 and 2nd Team All-Mid Penn in 2014.
